headline: Here’s Why Conestoga Capital Advisors Sold Align Technology (ALGN)
summary: Conestoga Capital Advisors, an asset management company, released its first-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equity markets started the year with a rally due to optimism about a strong economy and expectations of moderating inflation and lower interest rates.
